dynamicalSystems
Class Stock

java.lang.Object
  dynamicalSystems.Entity
      dynamicalSystems.Element
          dynamicalSystems.Stock

public class Stock
extends Element

A Stock uses the input or the output given by flows (inflows,outFlows), to add or to subtract its values. Only flows can be connected to stocks.

When you want the stock to be connected to Converters,or other Stocks, you shall use converters and set them as stocks.

Author:
Wellington Bruno
See Also:
Converter.asStock

Stock

public Stock(java.lang.String name)
      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Constructs a Stock containing just a name,without a initial Value. In this case, the value will be zero.
